thread.section_title: Trustpilot UK Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of uk.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Maretta Rees
thread.title_full: Trustpilot UK reviewed by Maretta Rees

author: Maretta Rees
title: Maretta Rees
text: I think this is an excellent idea, especially as I have been so disappointed with some of the companies I have dealt with online. It is certainly a good idea to have a platform for viewing and reviewing companies in order to avoid wasting precious time and, often, money on companies who do not care about their customers.
